abstract: German chip maker Dialog Semiconductor will buy American competitor Atmel for $4.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: The acquisition adds to a wave of deal-making among semiconductor makers as the firms seek alternatives to saturated mobile phone markets.

headline.main: Dialog to Buy Rival Chip Maker Atmel for $4.6 Billion
headline.print_headline: Dialog, German Chip Maker, to Buy Atmel for $4.6 Billion

snippet: The acquisition adds to a wave of deal-making among semiconductor makers as the firms seek alternatives to saturated mobile phone markets.
